# kernel 
```
#define XFS_TRANSACTION         0x69
#define XFS_VOLUME              0x2
#define XFS_LOG                 0xaa
```
# 获取`logstart`
```
xfs_db> sb
xfs_db> p
magicnum = 0x58465342
blocksize = 4096
dblocks = 262144
rblocks = 0
rextents = 0
uuid = f7fe9fe5-8120-4119-ab30-8cc3ffc55978
logstart = 131078
```
# 计算所在的block
```
131078 * 4096 = 536895488 
```
获取数据, 截取lsn: [1,2 ,  1,6)
```
hexdump -s 536895488 xfs_test.img
```
